name: Crabwave (Team 0, Matteo Belli, Cinfa, Ironwing7, Feybrand)
name_original: Crabwave (Team 0, Matteo Belli, Cinfa, Ironwing7, Feybrand)
description:
Crabwave

The evil moles have threatened the beach with their huge drills looking for shiny crystals under its surface!

Embark with Crabby on this fantastic adventure to the beat of music!
Use your claws to destroy the moles and their machinery in order to save your beach and your species!


Break crystals, pipes and anything that stands in your way!
Break through obstacles!
Avoid danger!
Slap the moles! Controls KeyboardControllerWASD = Left Claw
Arrows = Right Claw
Space = Confirm
Enter = Pause
Esc = BackLeft Analog  = Left Claw
Right Analog  = Right Claw
A = Confirm
Start = Pause
Select/B = Back -Game Design-

Comparoni Nicholas
Belli Matteo
Gianvincenzo Enrico
